records.context_note: TCG patrol boats escorted rubber boat with POB towards the HTW executing dangerous maneuverers.
records.evidence_quote: On 09th November at Text removed - Reporting Tools a rubber boat with approximately 40 migrants onboard was early detected by Text removed Technical Equipment at the sea area East of Lesvos island, inside TTW sailing in parallel to borderline, accompanied by two TCG patrol boats.

records.context_note: Text removed - Reporting Tools MARE LIBERUM REPORT on alleged pushbacks
records.evidence_quote: On 20.10.2020, at Text removed - Reporting Tools, the migrants were intercepted on their way to Italy and dispersed in 2 HCG vessels. The first group of 121 male migrants were left in life rafts near Rhodes and picked up by TCG at Text removed - Reporting Tools.

records.context_note: Migrant's boat with 18 migrants collided into Text removed - Technical Equipment
records.evidence_quote: On 22 August SE CPB was trying to stop the migrant's boat with 18 persons onboard close to Lesvos. During this incident the captain of the migrant's boat rammed into SE CPB causing damages to both vessels. No injuries were reported.

records.evidence_quote: In total 6 migrants were rescued while 4 migrants were recovered dead. According to migrants statement they were 13 persons onboard a plastic boat that capsized and 3 migrants are still missing.
